'''Sautéed Matsutake''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Sautéed Matsutake is obtainable from [[Sara]] at [[Good Hunter]] for 5,000 [[Mora]] after reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 35.

Depending on the quality, Sautéed Matsutake increases the party's attack by '''160'''/'''194'''/'''228''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
